description: This file contains a list of all World ID repositories. Descriptions are automatically pulled from GitHub.

list.name: World ID JS
list.description: Integrate World ID into your app/DApp with the World ID JS widget.

list.name: World ID Starter Kit - Foundry
list.description: Smart contracts required to get started building with World ID

list.name: World ID Starter Kit - Hardhat
list.description: Smart contracts required to get started building with World ID

list.name: World ID Mock App
list.description: Mock app that handles World ID verfication requests to use World ID's Test Network. Docs: https://id.worldcoin.org/test

list.name: World ID Airdrop
list.description: Airdrop ERC-20 tokens to a group of addresses using World ID, preserving privacy for the claimers with zero-knowledge proofs. Dapp example: https://github.com/worldcoin/world-id-example-airdrop-dapp
